author: Alex Noddings

changelog.release_notes: Updated to rework how the face is drawn, and added configs for fonts.
Initial release of the watchface. Currently tells the time, and has functional battery and Bluetooth indicators.

description:
Shows the date and time as text. 
Shows the battery percentage in the top right, represented by a series of vertical bars.
Shows an icon and vibrates if you lose connection to the Pebble app.
As of 1.3, their is also a config for colours.
As of 1.4, the battery and Bluetooth icons are colourable.
As of 1.5, the watchface now looks nicer :)
As of 1.6, there is also a config for fonts.

What else do you need from a watch face?*

Screenshot 1:
Sun 3, 12:45, Bluetooth connected at 100% battery 
Screenshot 2:
Sun 3, 12:57, Bluetooth disconnected at 20% battery 
Screenshot 3:
Sun 3, 01:24, Bluetooth connected at 80% battery 

*Currently working on (in no particular order):
◇Charging icon
◇Optional Step/Sleep widget at the bottom
◇Optional weather widget
◇A config for optional widgets

Either email me or send me a PM (www.reddit.com/user/sish101) if you have any suggestions on other features, or improvements to current ones.

latest_release.release_notes: Updated to rework how the face is drawn, and added configs for fonts.

title: TimeText101
